mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (id,seller_id,name,price, amount, sell_amount, discount_rate,todaysale,create_at) VALUES (#{id},#{seller_id},#{name},#{price},#{amount},#{sell_amount}, #{discount_rate}, #{todaysale}, #{create_at})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET name=#{name},price=#{price},amount=#{amount}, sell_amount =#{sell_amount}, discount_rate = #{discount_rate}, todaysale = #{todaysale}, create_at=#{create_at} WHERE id=#{id}
